Detailed Description

template<typename P>
struct geometry::strategy::simplify::douglas_peucker_point< P >

Small wrapper around a point, with an extra member "included".

  • We could implement a complete point as well but that is not necessary
  • We could derive from geometry::point but we need the original later on, including extra members; besides that it is not necessary to copy points during the algorithm
    Template parameters:
  • P the enclosed point type
